title.rendered: Olivier Decombes interviewed by SPE London Review

content.rendered:
Olivier Decombes, Director of adjusting from our London office, was recently interviewed by SPE Review London for their September/October 2020 edition. 

Featured in the Review’s C-Level Talks, Olivier shares his career journey, starting as a Field Engineer with Schlumberger and working in challenging environments in Africa and Venezuela, to his current role as a Director based in our London office. Current students and recent graduates are highly encouraged to read this article to gain valuable career insights.

This edition also features the Energy Institute Best MSc Research Thesis in Petroleum Engineering at Imperial College London in 2020.

The full magazine can be accessed here:
